company.label: Company
company.description: Represents organizations, storing information such as industry, location, and related contacts or deals.

contact.label: Contact
contact.description: Captures individual people's personal information, communication history, and interactions with your company.

contactcompanyassociation.label: Contact-Company Association
contactcompanyassociation.description: Defines the relationship between contacts and companies, linking individual people to their associated organizations.

contactcompanyassociationtype.label: Contact-Company Association Type
contactcompanyassociationtype.description: Categorizes the type of relationship between contacts and companies.

owner.label: Owner
owner.description: Represents team members responsible for managing and nurturing contacts, companies, deals, or tickets in the CRM.

product.label: Product
product.description: Contains information about goods or services offered by the business, such as pricing, descriptions, and stock levels.

quote.label: Quote
quote.description: Represents a formal sales proposal provided to a potential customer, outlining the products, services, and associated costs.

ticket.label: Ticket
ticket.description: Used to manage customer support issues, documenting the problem, tracking its resolution progress, and maintaining communication with the customer.

user.label: User
user.description: Represents individual CRM system users, including their account information, roles and permissions.
